items.title: Runaway reindeer sparks huge search operation after fleeing festive celebration
items.description: The animal, named Buddy, fled a festive celebration on the coast and went on the run for hours.

items.title: US and UK agree zero tariffs deal on pharmaceuticals
items.description: The deal follows threats of tariffs as high as 100% on branded drug imports.

items.title: Banquet, Bowie and football in upcoming German state visit
items.description: King Charles this week in Windsor will host the first state visit from Germany for 27 years.

items.title: Regulator backtracks on 'ghost train' plan
items.description: After announcing the popular service would no longer accept passengers the ORR changes its mind.

items.title: Weather warnings issued as heavy rain hits the UK with flooding expected
items.description: Parts of the UK could see a month's worth of rainfall in just one day.
